# MoO Header

## App
```html
<header id="nav" class="Header">

  <div class="Header-pseudoNav">
    <nav class="Header-brand u-lg-hidden">
        <div>
            <a class="Header-brandLink Header-brandMark u-pH0" href="/">
              <img class="Logo" alt="Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company" src="//cdnitg.mutualofomaha.com/images/corporate/pixel.png">
            </a>
            <a class="Header-brandLink Header-wordMark u-pH0" href="/">
              <img class="Logo" alt="Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company" src="//cdnitg.mutualofomaha.com/images/corporate/pixel.png">
            </a>
        </div>
    </nav>
    <div class="Header-toggle">
      <a href="#nav" class="Header-toggleLink u-inlineBlock u-alignMiddle" data-nav-toggle>
        <span class="Icon Header-iconToggle"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Open/Close Menu</span>
      </a>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="Hero">
    <div class="Container u-pT2 u-pB8 u-pH4 u-md-pH8">
      <h1 class="Hero-headline u-pT11">
        <a href="/" class="u-fontWhite">Page Title</a>
      </h1>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="Header-navigation">
    <div class="Navigation">
      <div class="Container">
        <nav class="Header-brand u-hidden u-md-block">
          <div>
            <a class="Header-brandLink u-pH0" href="/">
              <img class="Logo" alt="Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company" src="//cdn.mutualofomaha.com/images/corporate/pixel.png">
            </a>
          </div>
        </nav>
        <nav class="MainNav">
          <div class="MainNav-item">
            <a href="/link-1" class="MainNav-itemLink">
              <span class="MainNav-itemPill">Link</span>
            </a>
          </div>
          <div class="MainNav-item">
            <a href="/link-2" class="MainNav-itemLink">
              <span class="MainNav-itemPill">Link</span>
            </a>
          </div>
        </nav>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="Navigation-dropdownContainer">
        <div class="Container"></div>
    </div>
  </div>

</header>
```

## With Drawer Navigation
Requires `.has-drawer` to be applied to `body` and `html`, as well.
```html
<header id="nav" class="Header">

  <div class="Header-pseudoNav">
    <nav class="Header-brand u-lg-hidden">
      <div>
        <a class="Header-brandLink u-pH0" href="/">
          <img class="Logo" alt="Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company" src="//cdn.mutualofomaha.com/images/corporate/pixel.png">
        </a>
      </div>
    </nav>

    <div class="Header-toggle">
      <a href="#nav" class="Header-toggleLink" data-nav-toggle>
        <span class="Icon Header-iconToggle"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Open/Close Menu</span>
      </a>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="Hero">
    <div class="Container u-pT2 u-pB8 u-pH4 u-md-pH8">
      <h1 class="Hero-headline u-pT11">
        <a href="/" class="u-fontWhite">Page Title</a>
      </h1>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="Header-navigation">
    <div class="Navigation">

      <div class="Container">
        <nav class="Header-brand u-hidden u-md-block">
          <div>
            <a class="Header-brandLink u-pH0" href="/">
              <img class="Logo" alt="Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company" src="//cdn.mutualofomaha.com/images/corporate/pixel.png">
            </a>
          </div>
        </nav>
        <nav class="u-hidden u-md-inlineBlock u-floatRight">
          <a href="#nav" class="Header-toggleLink" data-nav-toggle>
            <span class="Icon Header-iconToggle"></span>
            <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Open/Close Menu</span>
          </a>
        </nav>
        <nav id="mainnav" class="MainNav MainNav--drawer">
          <div class="MainNav-item">
            <a href="/link-1" class="MainNav-itemLink">
              <span class="MainNav-itemPill">Link</span>
            </a>
          </div>
          <div class="MainNav-item">
            <a href="/link-2" class="MainNav-itemLink">
              <span class="MainNav-itemPill">Link</span>
            </a>
          </div>
        </nav>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

</header>
```

## Drawer Navigation Alternate
Requires `.has-drawer` to be applied to `body` and `html`, as well.
```html
<header class="Header Header--drawer u-bgBlueDark">

<div class="Header-navigation">
    <div class="Navigation Navigation--drawer">

      <div class="Container">
        <nav class="Header-brand u-block">
          <div>
            <a class="Header-brandLink u-pH0" href="/">
              <img class="Logo" alt="Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company" src="//cdn.mutualofomaha.com/images/corporate/pixel.png">
            </a>
          </div>
        </nav>
        <nav class="u-inlineBlock u-floatRight">
          <a href="#nav" class="Header-toggleLink" data-nav-toggle>
            <span class="Icon Header-iconToggle"></span>
            <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Open/Close Menu</span>
          </a>
        </nav>
        <!-- DrawerNav -->
        <nav id="nav"  class="DrawerNav u-pH2">
          <div class="DrawerNav-item u-textRight">
            <a href="#nav" class="Header-toggleLink" data-nav-toggle>
              <span class="Icon Header-iconToggle"></span>
              <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Open/Close Menu</span>
            </a>
          </div>
          <div class="DrawerNav-item u-pH5">
            <small class="u-fontGray u-textCaps">Products</small>
          </div>
          <div class="DrawerNav-item DrawerNav-item--tabs">
            <div class="Tabs">
              <div class="Tabs-labels u-pB4">
                <a href="#" class="Tabs-label">
                  <span class="Tabs-pill">
                    Children's Whole Life
                  <span class="Tabs-arrow"></span>
                  </span>
                </a>
                <a href="#" class="Tabs-label">
                  <span class="Tabs-pill">
                    Living Promise
                  <span class="Tabs-arrow"></span>
                  </span>
                </a>
                <a href="#" class="Tabs-label">
                  <span class="Tabs-pill">
                    Term Life Express
                  <span class="Tabs-arrow"></span>
                  </span>
                </a>
                <a href="#" class="Tabs-label">
                  <span class="Tabs-pill">
                    Guaranteed ADvantage
                  <span class="Tabs-arrow"></span>
                  </span>
                </a>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="DrawerNav-item u-pH5">
            <a href="#" class="DrawerNav-itemLink">
              Home
            </a>
          </div>
          <div class="DrawerNav-footer">
            <div class="Footer-disclaimer">
              <p>Copyright Holder All Rights Reserved.</p>
              <p>Copyright (c) 2014 Copyright Holder All Rights Reserved.</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </nav>
        <!-- End DrawerNav -->
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

</header>
```

## With Back Arrow
Only for use with the app-/app-with-drawer-style header
```html
<header id="nav" class="Header Header--centered">

  <div class="Header-pseudoNav">
    <nav class="u-inlineBlock u-floatLeft">
      <a href="#" class="Header-backLink">
        <span class="Header-iconBack u-inlineBlock u-alignMiddle"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Back</span>
      </a>
    </nav>

    <nav class="Header-brand">
      <div>
        <a class="Header-brandLink u-pH0" href="/">
          <img class="Logo" alt="Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company" src="//cdn.mutualofomaha.com/images/corporate/pixel.png">
        </a>
      </div>
    </nav>

    <nav class="Header-toggle">
      <a href="#nav" class="Header-toggleLink" data-nav-toggle>
        <span class="Icon Header-iconToggle"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Open/Close Menu</span>
      </a>
    </nav>
  </div>

  <div class="Header-navigation">
    <div class="Navigation">
      <div class="Container">
        <nav id="mainnav" class="MainNav MainNav--drawer">
          <div class="MainNav-item">
            <a href="/link-1" class="MainNav-itemLink">
              <span class="MainNav-itemPill">Link</span>
            </a>
          </div>
          <div class="MainNav-item">
            <a href="/link-2" class="MainNav-itemLink">
              <span class="MainNav-itemPill">Link</span>
            </a>
          </div>
        </nav>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

</header>
```

## With Cover Photo
```html
<header id="nav" class="Header Header--coverPhoto" style="background-image:url(https://ununsplash.imgix.net/photo-1429105049372-8d928fd29ba1?q=75&fm=jpg&w=1080&fit=max&s=fc31b4ecd9c31e35e290a12fca34a051)">

  <div class="Header-pseudoNav">
    <nav class="Header-brand u-lg-hidden">
        <div>
            <a class="Header-brandLink Header-brandMark u-pH0" href="/">
              <img class="Logo" alt="Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company" src="//cdnitg.mutualofomaha.com/images/corporate/pixel.png">
            </a>
            <a class="Header-brandLink Header-wordMark u-pH0" href="/">
              <img class="Logo" alt="Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company" src="//cdnitg.mutualofomaha.com/images/corporate/pixel.png">
            </a>
        </div>
    </nav>
    <div class="Header-toggle">
      <a href="#nav" class="Header-toggleLink u-inlineBlock u-alignMiddle" data-nav-toggle>
        <span class="Icon Header-iconToggle"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Open/Close Menu</span>
      </a>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="Hero Hero--coverPhoto">
    <div class="Container u-pT2 u-pB8 u-pH4 u-md-pH8">
      <h1 class="Hero-headline u-pT11">
        <a href="index.html" class="u-fontWhite">Page Title</a>
      </h1>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="Header-navigation">
    <nav class="PageNav PageNav--coverPhoto" data-stickable>
      <div class="Container u-md-pH8">
        <span class="PageNav-currentPage">Current Page</span>
        <ul class="PageNav-menu">
          <li class="PageNav-item">
            <a href="/link" class="PageNav-itemLink">
              <span class="PageNav-itemText">Link</span>
            </a>
          </li>
          <li class="PageNav-item">
            <a href="/link" class="PageNav-itemLink">
              <span class="PageNav-itemText">Link</span>
            </a>
          </li>
          <li class="PageNav-item">
            <a href="/link" class="PageNav-itemLink">
              <span class="PageNav-itemText">Link</span>
            </a>
          </li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </nav>

    <div class="Navigation">
      <div class="Container">
        <nav class="MainNav">
          <div class="Container">
            <div class="MainNav-item">
              <a href="/Link" class="MainNav-itemLink" data-nav-openable="#individuals">
                <span class="MainNav-itemPill">Link</span>
                <span class="MainNav-itemArrow"></span>
              </a>
            </div>
            <div class="MainNav-item">
              <a href="/Link" class="MainNav-itemLink" data-nav-openable="#businesses">
                <span class="MainNav-itemPill">Link</span>
                <span class="MainNav-itemArrow"></span>
              </a>
            </div>
            <div class="MainNav-item">
              <a href="/Link" class="MainNav-itemLink">
                <span class="MainNav-itemPill">Link</span>
              </a>
            </div>
            <div class="MainNav-item">
              <a href="/Link" class="MainNav-itemLink">
                <span class="MainNav-itemPill">Link</span>
              </a>
            </div>
          </div>
        </nav>

        <nav class="Header-brand u-hidden u-md-block">
          <div>
            <a class="Header-brandLink u-pH0" href="/">
              <img class="Logo" alt="Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company" src="//cdn.mutualofomaha.com/images/corporate/pixel.png">
            </a>
          </div>
        </nav>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="Navigation-dropdownContainer">
        <div class="Container"></div>
    </div>
  </div>

</header>
```
